item.description:
If you loved your last read and want to discuss it, send us the title and we'll include it in next month's posting as an option for these in-store discussion groups. Others can read it before they come or take a copy home that night because your $20 includes a $10 gift certificate toward any purchase that night as well as ice-breakers and refreshments. Ages: 30+

A list of forming book clubs will be posted on www.SinglesMinglesBoston.com and there will be fun opportunities to form other clubs on-the-spot.
item.how_to_find_us: The Singles Mingles Boston Team will greet you at the door.
item.why: This event will have something for everyone, readers and non-readers alike! Form a book club or just play! Your entrance fee includes $10 toward your purchase.
item.name: Book Clubbing & Budding Cooks
